item.title: New Container: Syslog-Ng
item.description: We have released a new container for Syslog-Ng! syslog-ng allows you to flexibly collect, parse, classify, rewrite and correlate logs from across your infrastructure and store or route them to log analysis tools.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Syslog-Ng!

syslog-ng allows you to flexibly collect, parse, classify, rewrite and correlate logs from across your infrastructure and store or route them to log analysis tools.
